body_html:
If you've updated the code as described I'm not sure what's going on, as the logcat clearly shows that it's looking for a node named "input". Are you sure the APK is actually getting rebuilt properly and pushed to device?

Also you should only have to edit ClassifierActivity.java to update the default values. Just adding new constant fields to TensorFlowImageClassifier.java (if that's what you meant) won't do anything by itself.

body:
If you've updated the code as described I'm not sure what's going on, as the logcat clearly shows that it's looking for a node named "input". Are you sure the APK is actually getting rebuilt properly and pushed to device?

Also you should only have to edit ClassifierActivity.java to update the default values. Just adding new constant fields to TensorFlowImageClassifier.java (if that's what you meant) won't do anything by itself.
